revisionDesc.change: Finalized - Ready. Introduced lines 10a and 11a to make the interlinear additions as clear as is possible. As there is a break in the word φιλα|λήθει at the end of the interlinear line above line 10 I chose to bring the two interlinear lines together.
Vote - AcceptText - See Heilporn's comments.

Vote - AcceptText - Accept. Line 11, δέκα κ[αὶ] πέντε seems the best way to explain the spacing, and is supported by a close parallel; Ἡ̣ρακλ̣.3 is an obvious improvement (but correct the spirit). In line 13, λοιπῶν is clear and correct. Finalizer, please note that in l. 11, the initial ὲν is an addition in the left margin, and that lines 9a-10a are a supralinear addition which should in fact go after <:δεῖ|reg|δῖ:> in l. 10 (as it is currently displayed in PN, after l. 11, it doesn't make much sense). The ed.pr. doesn't use 9a-10a (the index refers to it as "10 interlinear", even if it extends to above l. 11). Please see if you can fix this. Also, there is no diaeresis on the iota of [γ]εωργοὶ in l. 14 of the ed.pr. (nor does it look like there is any on the picture). There are 2 traces of a line 18 (not in ed.pr.).
corrections (on photo) in: l. 11 δέκα πέντε -> δέκα κ[αὶ] πέντε l. 11 ιγιρ.. -> Ἠ̣ρακλ̣ ̣ ̣ l. 13 λοιπω -> λοιπῶν
Vote - Return-Straight-to-Sender - Sending back to let you look at this again, as we decided.

CORRECTIONS I HAVE PROPOSED IN ll. 11 (two) and l. 14
PNYU 1a (P.Corn. inv. II 37) is from Karanis and is dated to A.D. 318-320. There are some corrections on the text after its restoration. The image is available in http://quod.lib.umich.edu/a/apis/x-1254/c2_37r.tif. In l. 11: between δέκα πέντε, there is trace of a letter and a space for 2-3 letters and we could assume δέκα κ[αὶ] πέντε; cf. P.Cair.Isid. 77, 6 (Karanis; A.D. 320). Then, instead of ιγιρ, where there is no trema on the first ι, probably we should read Ἠ̣ρακλ̣ ̣ ̣ ̣. Also, in l. 13: instead of λοιπω read λοιπῶν.

Submit - CORRECTIONS I HAVE PROPOSED IN ll. 11 (two) and l. 14
PNYU 1a (P.Corn. inv. II 37) is from Karanis and is dated to A.D. 318-320. There are some corrections on the text after its restoration. The image is available in http://quod.lib.umich.edu/a/apis/x-1254/c2_37r.tif. In l. 11: between δέκα πέντε, there is trace of a letter and a space for 2-3 letters and we could assume δέκα κ[αὶ] πέντε; cf. P.Cair.Isid. 77, 6 (Karanis; A.D. 320). Then, instead of ιγιρ, where there is no trema on the first ι, probably we should read Ἠ̣ρακλ̣ ̣ ̣ ̣. Also, in l. 13: instead of λοιπω read λοιπῶν.
Commit - CORRECTIONS I HAVE PROPOSED IN ll. 11 (two) and l. 14
rationalized languages in langUsage
changed editor names to URIs
Automatic insertion of lb tags into origs to match existing lb tags in the reg
changed type=inWord to break=no
Automatically updated revision description
Automated transfer of accents across reg-orig pairs
moved linebreak and missing characters into reg
batch converted all tei:sic to tei:orig and tei:corr to tei:reg
changed schema; added xml:space=preserve; indented; moved title/@n to idno
Added language la-Grek
Converted from TEI P4 (EpiDoc DTD v. 6) to P5 (EpiDoc RNG schema)
Automated split from transcoder files

div.ab:
Οὐαλερίῳ Ζίπερι τῷ διασημοτάτῳ
ἡγουμένῳ Ἡρκουλίας Αἰγύπτου
παρὰ Αὐρηλίων Οὐσενούφεως Ἡρᾶ καὶ Ἡρᾶ
Ἀτισίου καὶ Ἥρωνος Ἀπίωνος τῶν
τριῶν ἀπὸ κώμης Καρανίδος τοῦ Ἀρσινοίτου
νομοῦ. τῷ μὲν δοκεῖνδοκῖν, ἡγεμὼν δέσποτα,
ὑπὲρ ἑαυτῶν τὸν λόγον προτινόμεθα,
ἔργῳ δὲ ἀληθεῖ καὶ δυνάμει ὑπὲρ λυσιτε
λείας τῶν φόρων τοῦ ἱερωτάτου ταμίου.
παρὰ σοὶ τῷ φιλα
λήθειφιλα
λήθη
ἔσμεν τοίνυν, ἐπεὶ ἀψευδεῖνἀψευδῖν δεῖδῖ γεωργοὶ μ
ὲν ἀρουρῶν δέκα καὶ πέντεδέκα πέντε Ἡρακλιγιρακ
φνος καὶ ρου ἀπὸ τῆσδε τῆς πόλεως.
εἰσὶν δὲ λοιπῶνλοιπω αὐτὸ γὰρ
ειςγεωργοὶ
οντων
λούντων
ὑποβαλλο
